716429.title: Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs
716429.summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs a try. One serving contains 543 calories, 17g of protein, and 16g of fat. For $1.57 per serving, this recipe covers 22% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 2. A mixture of butter, white wine, pasta, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. 209 people have tried and liked this recipe. It is brought to you by fullbellysisters.blogspot.com. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 83%, which is tremendous. If you like this recipe, take a look at these similar recipes: Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs, Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs, and Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs.

winePairing.pairingText: No one wine will suit every pasta dish. Pasta in a tomato-based sauce will usually work well with a medium-bodied red, such as a montepulciano or chianti. Pasta with seafood or pesto will fare better with a light-bodied white, such as a pinot grigio. Cheese-heavy pasta can pair well with red or white - you might try a sangiovese wine for hard cheeses and a chardonnay for soft cheeses. We may be able to make a better recommendation if you ask again with a specific pasta dish.

steps.step: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F.
Whisk together the flour, pecans, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a medium bowl.
Whisk together the eggs, buttermilk, butter and vanilla extract and vanilla bean in a small bowl.
Add the egg mixture to the dry mixture and gently mix to combine. Do not overmix.
Let the batter sit at room temperature for at least 15 minutes and up to 30 minutes before using.

Heat a cast iron or nonstick griddle pan over medium heat and brush with melted butter. Once the butter begins to sizzle, use 2 tablespoons of the batter for each pancake and cook until the bubbles appear on the surface and the bottom is golden brown, about 2 minutes, flip over and cook until the bottom is golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes longer.
Transfer the pancakes to a platter and keep warm in a 200 degree F oven.
Serve 6 pancakes per person, top each with some of the bourbon butter.
Drizzle with warm maple syrup and dust with confectioners' sugar.
Garnish with fresh mint sprigs and more toasted pecans, if desired.
Combine the bourbon and sugar in a small saucepan and cook over high heat until reduced to 3 tablespoons, remove and let cool.
Put the butter, molasses, salt and cooled bourbon mixture in a food processor and process until smooth.
Scrape into a bowl, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to meld.
Remove from the refrigerator about 30 minutes before using to soften.

11111.title: Margherita Pizza
11111.summary: Margherita Pizza is a classic Italian dish made with tomatoes, mozzarella, fresh basil, salt, and extra-virgin olive oil. Perfect for a quick dinner.

winePairing.pairingText: Pasta in a tomato-based sauce will usually work well with a medium-bodied red, such as a chianti. Cheese-heavy pizza can pair well with red or white - you might try a sangiovese wine for hard cheeses and a chardonnay for soft cheeses.

11111.instructions: Preheat the oven to 475째F (245째C). Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface. Spread the tomato sauce over the dough. Add the mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves. Drizzle with extra-virgin olive oil and season with salt. Bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly. Serve hot and enjoy your Margherita Pizza!

steps.step: Preheat the oven to 475째F (245째C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface until it reaches your desired thickness. Ensure the dough is even to cook properly.
Spread the tomato sauce evenly over the dough using a spoon. Leave a small border around the edges for the crust.
Add the shredded mozzarella cheese evenly across the pizza. Place fresh basil leaves on top of the cheese.
Drizzle extra-virgin olive oil over the pizza and season with a pinch of salt to enhance the flavors.
Bake the pizza in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes. Keep an eye on the pizza to prevent burning. The pizza is ready when the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly and slightly browned.
Remove the pizza from the oven. Let it cool for a minute before slicing. Serve hot and enjoy your Margherita Pizza!

22222.title: Cheeseburger
22222.summary: A delicious cheeseburger made with a juicy beef patty, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and a special burger sauce.

winePairing.pairingText: A juicy cheeseburger pairs well with full-bodied red wines like Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, or Syrah.

22222.instructions: Preheat the grill or a skillet over medium-high heat. Season the beef patties with salt and pepper. Cook the patties for 3-4 minutes on each side or until desired doneness. Place a slice of cheddar cheese on each patty and let it melt. Toast the burger buns on the grill or in a skillet. Assemble the burgers by placing the patties on the buns and adding lettuce, tomato, and the special sauce. Serve hot and enjoy your cheeseburger!

steps.step: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F.
Whisk together the flour, pecans, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a medium bowl.
Whisk together the eggs, buttermilk, butter and vanilla extract and vanilla bean in a small bowl.
Add the egg mixture to the dry mixture and gently mix to combine. Do not overmix.
Let the batter sit at room temperature for at least 15 minutes and up to 30 minutes before using.

Heat a cast iron or nonstick griddle pan over medium heat and brush with melted butter. Once the butter begins to sizzle, use 2 tablespoons of the batter for each pancake and cook until the bubbles appear on the surface and the bottom is golden brown, about 2 minutes, flip over and cook until the bottom is golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes longer.
Transfer the pancakes to a platter and keep warm in a 200 degree F oven.
Serve 6 pancakes per person, top each with some of the bourbon butter.
Drizzle with warm maple syrup and dust with confectioners' sugar.
Garnish with fresh mint sprigs and more toasted pecans, if desired.
Combine the bourbon and sugar in a small saucepan and cook over high heat until reduced to 3 tablespoons, remove and let cool.
Put the butter, molasses, salt and cooled bourbon mixture in a food processor and process until smooth.
Scrape into a bowl, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to meld.
Remove from the refrigerator about 30 minutes before using to soften.

33333.title: Sushi Rolls
33333.summary: A variety of sushi rolls made with fresh vegetables, seaweed, and perfectly cooked sushi rice. A healthy and satisfying meal.

winePairing.pairingText: Sushi pairs well with sake, light white wines, or green tea for a refreshing combination.

33333.instructions: Rinse the sushi rice until the water runs clear. Cook the rice according to the package instructions. Mix the rice vinegar, sugar, and salt in a small bowl until dissolved. Add the vinegar mixture to the cooked rice and mix gently. Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat. Spread a thin layer of rice over the nori, leaving a small border. Add your choice of fillings (e.g., cucumber, avocado, carrot) in a line along one edge. Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat, pressing gently. Slice the roll into bite-sized pieces and serve with soy sauce, pickled ginger, and wasabi.

steps.step: Rinse the sushi rice under cold water until the water runs clear. This removes excess starch and prevents the rice from becoming too sticky.
Cook the rice according to the package instructions. Use a rice cooker for best results. Once cooked, let it steam for 10 minutes.
Mix the rice vinegar, sugar, and salt in a small bowl until dissolved. This mixture will be added to the rice to give it a tangy flavor.
Add the vinegar mixture to the cooked rice and mix gently using a wooden spoon or rice paddle. Be careful not to mash the rice.
Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo sushi mat with the shiny side down.
Spread a thin layer of rice over the nori, leaving a small border at the top edge. Wet your fingers with water to prevent the rice from sticking.
Add your choice of fillings (e.g., cucumber, avocado, carrot) in a line along one edge of the rice. Be careful not to overfill.
Roll the sushi tightly using the bamboo mat, pressing gently to shape the roll. Use the mat to help keep the roll tight and even.
Slice the roll into bite-sized pieces using a sharp knife. Serve with soy sauce, pickled ginger, and wasabi for dipping.

44444.title: Caesar Salad
44444.summary: Crispy romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing make this classic Caesar Salad a favorite starter or side dish.

winePairing.pairingText: Caesar Salad pairs well with crisp, light white wines such as Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, or Pinot Grigio.

44444.instructions: Wash and dry the romaine lettuce. Cut or tear the lettuce into bite-sized pieces. In a large bowl, toss the lettuce with Caesar dressing. Add the croutons and grated Parmesan cheese. Toss the salad gently until everything is evenly coated. Serve immediately and enjoy your Caesar Salad!

steps.step: Wash and dry the romaine lettuce thoroughly to ensure a crisp texture.
Cut or tear the lettuce into bite-sized pieces for easy eating.
In a large bowl, toss the lettuce with Caesar dressing. Ensure the dressing coats all the lettuce evenly.
Add the croutons and grated Parmesan cheese to the bowl.
Toss the salad gently until everything is evenly coated. Be careful not to crush the croutons.
Serve immediately and enjoy your Caesar Salad! For added flavor, you can garnish with additional Parmesan cheese and fresh ground pepper.

55555.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
55555.summary: Spaghetti Bolognese is a hearty Italian pasta dish made with ground beef, tomatoes, and a blend of spices. A family favorite!

winePairing.pairingText: Spaghetti Bolognese pairs well with medium-bodied red wines such as Chianti, Merlot, or Cabernet Sauvignon.

55555.instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add chopped onions, carrots, and celery, and cook until softened. Add minced garlic and ground beef, and cook until the beef is browned. Stir in the tomato paste and cook for another 2 minutes. Add canned tomatoes, beef broth, bay leaves, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, cook the spaghetti according to package instructions. Serve the Bolognese sauce over the cooked spaghetti and top with grated Parmesan cheese. Enjoy your Spaghetti Bolognese!

steps.step: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add chopped onions, carrots, and celery, and cook until softened.
Add minced garlic and ground beef, and cook until the beef is browned.
Stir in the tomato paste and cook for another 2 minutes.
Add canned tomatoes, beef broth, bay leaves, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Serve the Bolognese sauce over the cooked spaghetti and top with grated Parmesan cheese.
Enjoy your Spaghetti Bolognese!

extendedIngredients.name: chicken breasts
extendedIngredients.original: 1 lb chicken breasts, cut into pieces

66666.title: Chicken Curry
66666.summary: A flavorful chicken curry made with tender chicken pieces, aromatic spices, and creamy coconut milk. Serve with rice for a complete meal.

winePairing.pairingText: Chicken Curry pairs well with aromatic white wines such as Riesling, Gewurztraminer, or Pinot Gris.

66666.instructions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add chopped onions and cook until golden brown. Stir in minced garlic and ginger, and cook for another 2 minutes. Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned on all sides. Add the curry powder, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and chili powder, and cook for 1 minute. Pour in the coconut milk and bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to low and cook for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve the chicken curry over rice and garnish with fresh cilantro.

steps.step: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add chopped onions and cook until golden brown.
Stir in minced garlic and ginger, and cook for another 2 minutes.
Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned on all sides.
Add the curry powder, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and chili powder, and cook for 1 minute.
Pour in the coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Reduce heat to low and cook for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the chicken curry over rice and garnish with fresh cilantro.

extendedIngredients.name: black beans
extendedIngredients.original: 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed

77777.title: Veggie Burrito
77777.summary: A hearty veggie burrito filled with beans, rice, avocado, and fresh salsa. A perfect meal for vegetarians and vegans alike.

winePairing.pairingText: Veggie Burrito pairs well with wines such as Sauvignon Blanc, Ros챕, or Zinfandel.

77777.instructions: Cook the rice according to package instructions. Heat a skillet over medium heat and warm the beans. Prepare fresh salsa by combining chopped tomatoes, onions, cilantro, lime juice, salt, and pepper. Warm the tortillas in the skillet or microwave. Assemble the burritos by placing rice, beans, avocado slices, and fresh salsa on each tortilla. Roll up the burritos tightly and serve immediately.

steps.step: Cook the rice according to package instructions.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and warm the beans.
Prepare fresh salsa by combining chopped tomatoes, onions, cilantro, lime juice, salt, and pepper.
Warm the tortillas in the skillet or microwave.
Assemble the burritos by placing rice, beans, avocado slices, and fresh salsa on each tortilla.
Roll up the burritos tightly and serve immediately.

88888.title: Beef Stew
88888.summary: A rich and comforting beef stew made with tender beef, carrots, potatoes, and a savory broth. Perfect for a cold day.

winePairing.pairingText: Beef stew pairs well with red wines such as Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, or Zinfandel.

88888.instructions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add chopped onions and cook until golden brown. Stir in minced garlic and cook for another 2 minutes. Add the beef and cook until browned on all sides. Add beef broth, carrots, potatoes, and spices. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 1.5 to 2 hours, until the beef is tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot and enjoy your beef stew!

steps.step: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add chopped onions and cook until golden brown.
Stir in minced garlic and cook for another 2 minutes.
Add the beef and cook until browned on all sides.
Add beef broth, carrots, potatoes, and spices. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 1.5 to 2 hours, until the beef is tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot and enjoy your beef stew!

99999.title: Grilled Salmon
99999.summary: Grilled salmon seasoned with herbs and lemon. Serve with a side of vegetables for a healthy and delicious meal.

winePairing.pairingText: Grilled salmon pairs well with white wines such as Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, or Pinot Grigio.

99999.instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Season the salmon with salt, pepper, and herbs. Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the salmon before serving. Serve with a side of grilled vegetables.

steps.step: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season the salmon with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes on each side or until cooked through.
Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the salmon before serving.
Serve with a side of grilled vegetables.

101010.title: Chocolate Cake
101010.summary: A rich and moist chocolate cake topped with a creamy chocolate ganache. A perfect dessert for any chocolate lover.

winePairing.pairingText: Chocolate cake pairs well with sweet wines such as Port, Sherry, or Moscato.

101010.instructions: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C). In a large bowl, mix the dry ingredients together. Add the wet ingredients and mix until smooth. Pour the batter into a greased cake pan. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. Let the cake cool completely before frosting with chocolate ganache. To make the ganache, heat the cream and pour it over the chopped chocolate. Stir until smooth. Spread the ganache over the cooled cake.

steps.step: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C).
In a large bowl, mix the dry ingredients together.
Add the wet ingredients and mix until smooth.
Pour the batter into a greased cake pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Let the cake cool completely before frosting with chocolate ganache.
To make the ganache, heat the cream and pour it over the chopped chocolate. Stir until smooth.
Spread the ganache over the cooled cake.
